jcr:content.jcr:title: List of forests in the United Kingdom

contentheadline.headline: List of forests in the United Kingdom

contentrichtext.text: This is a list of some of the [[forest]]s in the [[United Kingdom]]. ==[[England]]== {{England Labelled Map|400px|float=right|Londonprefix = Greater|WMsuffix = (region)}} ===[[East Anglia]]=== '''[[Norfolk]]''' *[[Thetford Forest]] *[[Horsford Woods (Horsford Forest)]] ===[[The Midlands, England|The Midlands]]=== *[[Forest of Mercia]] '''[[West Midlands (county)|West Midlands]]''' *[[Black Country Urban Forest]] '''[[Shropshire]]''' *[[Royal forest#Royal forests in England|Morfe Forest]] *[[Mortimer Forest]] '''[[Staffordshire]]''' *[[Cannock Chase]] *[[Kinver Forest]] '''[[Warwickshire]]''' *[[Arden, Warwickshire|Forest of Arden]] *[[Forest of Dennis]] '''[[Worcestershire]]''' *[[Wyre Forest]] (part in '''Shropshire''') '''[[East Midlands]]''' * [[National Forest, England|National Forest]] '''[[Derbyshire]]''' *[[Darwin Forest]] '''[[Nottinghamshire]]''' *[[Greenwood Forest]] *[[Sherwood Forest]] '''[[Leicestershire]]''' *[[Charnwood Forest]] '''[[Rutland]]''' *[[Leighfield|Leighfield Forest]] '''[[Northamptonshire]]''' *[[Rockingham Forest]] ===[[North East England]]=== '''[[Northumberland]]''' *[[Kielder Forest]] '''[[County Durham]]''' * [[Hamsterley Forest]] ===[[North West England]]=== '''[[Cheshire]]''' *[[Delamere Forest]] *[[Mersey Forest]] *[[Macclesfield Forest]] '''[[Cumbria]]''' *[[Whinfell Forest]] '''[[Lancashire]]''' *[[Gisburn Forest]] ===[[South East England]]=== *[[Forest of Andred]] '''[[Essex]]''' *[[Epping Forest]] '''[[Bedfordshire]]''' *[[Forest of Marston Vale]] '''[[Buckinghamshire]]''' *[[Burnham Beeches]] *[[Whiteleaf, Buckinghamshire|Whiteleaf Hill]] '''[[Sussex]]''' *[[Ashdown Forest]] *[[Dallington Forest]] *[[St Leonard's Forest]] *[[Worth Forest]] '''[[Hampshire]]''' *[[New Forest]] '''[[Isle of Wight]]''' *[[Brighstone Forest]] *[[Parkhurst Forest]] '''[[Kent]]''' *[[Bedgebury Forest]] '''[[Oxfordshire]]''' *[[Wychwood]] ===[[South West England]]=== '''[[Somerset]]''' *the former [[Royal Forest]] of [[North Petherton]] *[[Selwood Forest]] *[[Forest of Avon Trust|Forest of Avon]] '''[[Gloucestershire]]''' * [[Royal Forest of Dean]] *[[Forest of Avon Trust|Forest of Avon]] '''[[Wiltshire]]''' *[[Savernake Forest]] '''[[Devon]]''' *[[Ashclyst Forest]] * Derbyland Forest ===[[Yorkshire]]=== *[[Dalby Forest]] *[[Wykeham Forest]] ==[[Scotland]]== '''Angus''' *[[Backmuir Wood]] '''Argyll and Bute''' *[[Argyll Forest Park]] '''Dumfries and Galloway''' *[[Forest of Ae]] *[[Carsphairn Forest]] *[[Corriedoo Forest]] *[[Dalbeattie Forest]] *[[Dundeugh Forest]] *[[Fleet Forest]] *[[Laurieston Forest]] *[[Mabie Forest]] *[[Penninghame Forest]] '''Strathspey & Badenoch''' *[[Abernethy Forest]] *[[Glenmore Forest Park|Glenmore Forest]] *[[Rothiemurchus Forest]] '''Fife''' *[[Tentsmuir Forest]] '''Scottish Borders''' *[[Craik Forest]] *[[Ettrick Forest]] *[[Wauchope Forest]] '''South Ayrshire''' *[[Arecleoch Forest]] *[[Carrick Forest]] *[[Changue Forest]] *[[Tairlaw Forest]] '''Stirling''' *[[Queen Elizabeth Forest Park]] *[[Rowardennan Forest]] *[[Strathyre Forest]] ==[[Wales]]== '''Caerfyrddin''' (Carmarthenshire) *[[Brechfa Forest]] '''Ceredigion''' *[[Penglais Nature Park]] '''Conwy''' *[[Gwydir Forest]] '''Conwy/Denbighshire''' *[[Clocaenog Forest]] '''Denbighshire''' *[[Llandegla Forest]] '''Gwynedd''' *[[Coed-y-Brenin]] '''Monmouthshire''' *[[Wentwood]] '''Neath Port Talbot''' *[[Afan Forest Park]] '''Powys''' *[[Clun Forest]] *[[Hafren Forest]] '''Ynys Mon''' (Anglesey) *[[Newborough Forest]] ==[[Northern Ireland]]== *[[Ballypatrick
